translation_english: he has known/she has known/you (formal) have known

We have learned everything.

example_sentence_english: If I knew the answer, I would tell you.

example_sentence_italian: Se tu sapessi cosa fare, aiuteresti.

example_sentence_italian: Se lui sapesse la verità, sarebbe triste.
example_sentence_english: If he knew the truth, he would be sad.

example_sentence_italian: Se noi sapessimo la soluzione, la diremmo.
example_sentence_english: If we knew the solution, we would say it.
